data.title: Life as a House - Full Cast & Crew
data.meta_description: Learn more about the full cast of Life as a House with news, photos, videos and more at TV Guide
data.text:
45 Metascore

2001

2 hr 5 mins

Drama

R

Watchlist

Where to Watch

Kevin Kline gives an effective performance in this bittersweet drama as a terminally ill man who tries to shore up the world around him before he dies by reconnecting with his estranged son and making peace with his ex-wife (Kristin Scott Thomas), all while building the home of his dreams. Hayden Christensen, Jena Malone, Mary Steenburgen, Jamey Sheridan, Scott Bakula.
